validate_input(input_fp, permissive=False)[source]¶

Given a JSON file, attempt to validate against a list of schemas Parameters:

input_fp (str): path to the target JSON file
Arguments:
permissive (bool): whether to return False on failure to validate
Returns:
boolean True if valid
